description:
http;//www.CityTV.nl

Milo Oostergo @ T-DOSE The place where experts meet on 5 and 6 November 2011, Eindhoven.

Milo Oostergo is Technical Product Manager at Zarafa since 2004. In this role he has been involved in the migration of many large scale corporate mail environments all over Europe.

Talk: Zarafa - from email system to Collaboration Platform
title: How to Zarafa, from email system to Collaboration Platform, Milo Oostergo @ T-DOSE 2011, Eindhoven
